CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 26, 1958, pg. A16 reads: "Happy Together - Mr. and Mrs. James Holmes celebrated their 44th wedding anniversary, April 19, when the Nurses Corps of Wesley Cneter [Center] AME Zion Church, of which Mrs. Holmes is president, gave a surprise dinner party for the couple. The affair was held at the couple's lovely home at 2714 Bedford Ave., and was attended by members of the Nurses Corps and friends of the Holmeses.  Mrs. Ethel Owens served as mistress of ceremonies, Mrs. Mae Harris was soloist, and the Rev. Charles H. Foggie, minister of Wesley Center, offered prayer. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. Charles H. Foggie, Mrs. Holmes, and James Holmes posed behind two tiered anniversary cake in their home at 2714 Bedford Avenue, Hill District
